issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Switch HttpFS from Tomcat to Jetty

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: HDFS-10860 deprecated environment variable HTTPFS_TEMP by mistake. This env var is still useful when the admin uses a custom temp directory for HttpFS.

comments.body:
Patch 001
* Un-deprecate HTTPFS_TEMP
* Set system property httpfs.temp.dir

Thanks Xiao. Will commit tomorrow pending no other comment.

Committed to trunk.

Thanks [~xiaochen] for the quick review!

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #12042 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/12042/])
HDFS-12166. Do not deprecate HTTPFS_TEMP. Contributed by John Zhuge. (jzhuge: rev 3b48f81411230d1cfa7b0f6ad82f44cb0dc0efa6)
